title: Fool’s Paradise
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
My heart speaks up, I don’t listen
Maybe I feel unforgiven
I’ll find a way to hide the shame and play the game
[Refrain]
The party’s not over
Losing up my composure
I’m so far from sober (ah)
I’m laughing, concealing
Hiding all my real feelings
I’m dancing to healing (ah)
[Pre Chorus]
Am I living it up?
Am I living it up?
So I don’t have to cry
Come on woman save yourself
Am I living a lie in a fool’s paradise?
Why can’t i just be myself
[Chorus]
I’m living in a fool’s paradise
Come on woman save yourself
I’m living in a fool’s paradise
Come on woman save yourself

[Verse 2]
I can’t keep this up forever
How long till someone figures me out
Till then I’ll find a way to entertain my pain
[Refrain]
The party’s not over
Losing up my composure
I’m so far from sober (ah)
I’m laughing, concealing
Hiding all my real feelings
I’m dancing to healing (ah)
[Chorus]
Am I living it up?
Am I living it up?
So I don’t have to cry
Come on woman save yourself
Am I living a lie in a fool’s paradise?
Why can’t i just be myself
[Post-Chorus]
I’m living in a fool’s paradise
Come on woman save yourself
I’m living in a fool’s paradise
Come on woman save yourself

[Bridge]
Paradise, yeah I’m a fool for you
Oh paradise, look what you made me do
I’ve been so blind, I’ve been so high
I’ve been high
Paradise, yeah I’m a fool for you
Oh paradise, look what you made me do
I’ve been so blind, I’ve been so high
I’ve been high
[Chorus]
Am I living it up?
Am I living it up?
So I don’t have to cry
Come on woman save yourself
Am I living a lie in a fool’s paradise?
Why can’t i just be myself
[Post-Chorus]
I’m living in a fool’s paradise
Come on woman save yourself
I’m living in a fool’s paradise
Come on woman save yourself
I’m living in a fool’s paradise
Come on woman save yourself
I’m living in a fool’s paradise
Come on woman save yourself
